review_title: Georgia Regional Hospital itself is a place that needs to take more pride in what it truly stands for.
job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Savannah, GA
pros: The staff on the unit I worked with we formed a bond on our shift. The residents respected all of us because we respected them. We (me and the FST's) made sure we did everything possible to make sure residents were cared for properly. Even though I was only an LPN I called Dr's and made sure residents were taken care of. The LPN med nurses stuck together
cons: Nurse Mgr only came out on unit 5 when there was an complaint on employees. She falsified many of them. But nothing is ever done to correct this. Administration is a joke they don't care what happens on campus. There is no togetherness.

cons: Could get hit by clients. Can be unsupportive environment. May have to work weekends. No regular raises.
